import React, { useState } from "react"; import "App.scss"; import { BrowserRouter as Router, Switch, Route, Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { Home } from "components/Home"; import { Login } from "components/Login"; import { Confirmation } from "components/ConfirmEmail"; import Saved from "components/container/WithSaved"; import { Sidebar, Segment, Menu, Icon } from "semantic-ui-react"; const SidebarContext = React.createContext(undefined); function App() { const [visible, setVisibility] = useState(false); return ( setVisibility(false)} vertical visible={visible} width="thin" > Home Test - Saved console.log(data)} onMouseLeave={() => console.log("leave")} /> Stage - Saved Log Out
setVisibility(true)} />
setVisibility(false)} /> ); } export default App;
